mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `KIMG`.`kimgDash` ( `nDasProduct`, `nDasItem`, `nDasTask`, `nDasIssue`, `nDasIssueReq`, `nDasPerson`, `nDasItemLook`, `nDasItemSign`, `nDasItemSpec`, `nDasItemSport`, `nDasTaskMan`, `nDasTaskIns`, `nDasTaskDel`, `nDasTaskDes`, `dDasCrtDate`) VALUES ( (select count(0) from KIMG.kimgProduct), (select count(0) from KIMG.kimgItem), (select count(0) from KIMG.kimgTask where cTskType <> 'INC'), (select count(0) from KIMG.kimgTask where cTskType = 'INC'), (select count(0) FROM KIMG.kimgTask where nTskDel = 0 and cTskType = 'INC' and cTskStatus = 'TRQ'), (select count(0) from KIMG.kimgPerson), (select count(0) from KIMG.kimgItem where nItmDel = 0 and cItmCate = 'lok'), (select count(0) from KIMG.kimgItem where nItmDel = 0 and cItmCate = 'sin'), (select count(0) from KIMG.kimgItem where nItmDel = 0 and cItmCate = 'spc'), (select count(0) from KIMG.kimgItem where nItmDel = 0 and cItmCate = 'eqi'), (select count(0) FROM KIMG.kimgTask where nTskDel = 0 and cTskType = 'MAN'), (select count(0) FROM KIMG.kimgTask where nTskDel = 0 and cTskType = 'INS'), (select count(0) FROM KIMG.kimgTask where nTskDel = 0 and cTskType = 'DEL'), (select count(0) FROM KIMG.kimgTask where nTskDel = 0 and cTskType = 'DES'), now());
mapper.select:
select v.cVenName as Venue, b.ven as vCode, ifnull(b.percent,0) as Progress, ifnull(b.manper,0) as manProgress, ifnull(b.delper,0) as delProgress, ifnull(b.insper,0) as insProgress, ifnull(b.desper,0) as desProgress from (select a.cItmVenue ven, (sum(pro)/4)/count(0)*100 as percent, sum(MAN)/count(0)*100 as manper, sum(DEL)/count(0)*100 as delper, sum(INS)/count(0)*100 as insper, sum(DES)/count(0)*100 as desper from (Select it.nItmCnt, it.cItmVenue, ifnull((select Case cTskStatus when 'ERQ' then 1 when 'CNF' then 1 ELSE 0 END from KIMG.kimgTask where nRefItm = it.nItmCnt and cTskType = 'MAN' order by nTskCnt desc limit 1),0) as MAN, ifnull((select Case cTskStatus when 'ERQ' then 1 when 'CNF' then 1 ELSE 0 END from KIMG.kimgTask where nRefItm = it.nItmCnt and cTskType = 'DEL' order by nTskCnt desc limit 1),0) as DEL, ifnull((select Case cTskStatus when 'ERQ' then 1 when 'CNF' then 1 ELSE 0 END from KIMG.kimgTask where nRefItm = it.nItmCnt and cTskType = 'INS' order by nTskCnt desc limit 1),0) as INS, ifnull((select Case cTskStatus when 'ERQ' then 1 when 'CNF' then 1 ELSE 0 END from KIMG.kimgTask where nRefItm = it.nItmCnt and cTskType = 'DES' order by nTskCnt desc limit 1),0) as DES,
ifnull((select Case cTskStatus when 'ERQ' then 1 when 'CNF' then 1 ELSE 0 END from KIMG.kimgTask where nRefItm = it.nItmCnt and cTskType = 'MAN' order by nTskCnt desc limit 1),0) + ifnull((select Case cTskStatus when 'ERQ' then 1 when 'CNF' then 1 ELSE 0 END from KIMG.kimgTask where nRefItm = it.nItmCnt and cTskType = 'DEL' order by nTskCnt desc limit 1),0) + ifnull((select Case cTskStatus when 'ERQ' then 1 when 'CNF' then 1 ELSE 0 END from KIMG.kimgTask where nRefItm = it.nItmCnt and cTskType = 'INS' order by nTskCnt desc limit 1),0) + ifnull((select Case cTskStatus when 'ERQ' then 1 when 'CNF' then 1 ELSE 0 END from KIMG.kimgTask where nRefItm = it.nItmCnt and cTskType = 'DES' order by nTskCnt desc limit 1),0) as pro from KIMG.kimgItem it) a group by a.cItmVenue) b left join KIMG.kimgVenue v on b.ven = v.cVenCode
SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgCompany

SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgPerson per left join KIMG.kimgPhoto pho on per.nPerCnt = pho.nRefCode and pho.cPhoType = 'per' and pho.nPhoDel = 0 left join `KIMG`.`kimgCompany` c on per.cPerCom = c.cComCode WHERE per.nPerDel = 0 and cPerId = #{cPerId} and cPerPwd = #{cPerPwd}

SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgPerson per left join KIMG.kimgPhoto pho on per.nPerCnt = pho.nRefCode and pho.cPhoType = 'per' and pho.nPhoDel = 0 left join `KIMG`.`kimgCompany` c on per.cPerCom = c.cComCode WHERE per.nPerDel = 0

SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgPerson per left join KIMG.kimgPhoto pho on per.nPerCnt = pho.nRefCode and pho.cPhoType = 'per' and pho.nPhoDel = 0 left join `KIMG`.`kimgCompany` c on per.cPerCom = c.cComCode WHERE per.nPerDel = 0 and (per.cPerName like CONCAT('%',#{vo},'%') or per.cPerId like CONCAT('%',#{vo},'%') or c.cComName like CONCAT('%',#{vo},'%'))
select * from `KIMG`.`kimgPhoto` WHERE `cPhoType` = #{cPhoType} and `nRefCode` = #{nRefCode} and `nPhoDel` = 0
SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgProduct where nPrdDel = 0;

SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgProduct where nPrdDel = 0 and ( 1=1
and cPrdLocalName like CONCAT('%',#{cPrdLocalName},'%')
and cPrdName like CONCAT('%',#{cPrdName},'%')
and cPrdCode like CONCAT('%',#{cPrdCode},'%')
and cPrdCat like CONCAT('%',#{cPrdCat},'%')
)

SELECT item.`nItmCnt`, item.`cItmCode`, item.`cItmCom`, item.`cItmVenue`, item.`cItmEvent`, item.`cItmCate`, (SELECT cTstPercent from KIMG.kimgTask kt left join KIMG.kimgTaskStatus ks on kt.cTskStatus = ks.cTstType where kt.cTskType = 'MAN' and nTskDel = 0 and nRefItm = nItmCnt order by kt.nTskCnt desc limit 1) as 'nManStatus', (SELECT cTstPercent from KIMG.kimgTask kt left join KIMG.kimgTaskStatus ks on kt.cTskStatus = ks.cTstType where kt.cTskType = 'INS' and nTskDel = 0 and nRefItm = nItmCnt order by kt.nTskCnt desc limit 1) as 'nInsStatus', (SELECT cTstPercent from KIMG.kimgTask kt left join KIMG.kimgTaskStatus ks on kt.cTskStatus = ks.cTstType where kt.cTskType = 'DES' and nTskDel = 0 and nRefItm = nItmCnt order by kt.nTskCnt desc limit 1) as 'nDesStatus', (SELECT cTstPercent from KIMG.kimgTask kt left join KIMG.kimgTaskStatus ks on kt.cTskStatus = ks.cTstType where kt.cTskType = 'DEL' and nTskDel = 0 and nRefItm = nItmCnt order by kt.nTskCnt desc limit 1) as 'nDelStatus', (SELECT count(0) FROM KIMG.kimgTask where nRefItm = nItmCnt and nTskDel = 0 and cTskType = 'INC' and cTskStatus in ('TRQ', 'ERQ')) as 'nIncStatus', item.cItmPrePho, item.cItmDesPho, item.cItmPosPho
FROM KIMG.kimgItem item
where nItmDel = 0 and ( 1=1
and item.cItmCode like CONCAT('%',#{cItmCode},'%')
and item.cItmProd like CONCAT('%',#{cItmProd},'%')
and item.cItmMate like CONCAT('%',#{cItmMate},'%')
and item.cItmCom like CONCAT('%',#{cItmCom},'%')
and item.cItmVenue like CONCAT('%',#{cItmVenue},'%')
and item.cItmSport like CONCAT('%',#{cItmSport},'%')
and item.cItmDept like CONCAT('%',#{cItmDept},'%')
and item.cItmEvent like CONCAT('%',#{cItmEvent},'%')
)
order by nItmCnt desc

SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgItem item left join KIMG.kimgProduct prod on item.cItmProd = prod.cPrdCode left join KIMG.kimgCategory cat on item.cItmCate = cat.cCatType left join KIMG.kimgEvent eve on item.cItmEvent = eve.cEvnCode left join KIMG.kimgVenue ven on item.cItmVenue = ven.cVenCode left join KIMG.kimgSport spor on item.cItmSport = spor.cSptCode left join KIMG.kimgDepartment dep on item.cItmDept = dep.cDptCode where nItmDel = 0 and item.nItmCnt = #{param}
SELECT distinct cItmMate FROM KIMG.kimgItem
SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgCategory
SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgEvent
SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgSport
SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgDepartment
SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgVenue

SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgItem itm left join KIMG.kimgPhoto pho on itm.nItmCnt = pho.nRefCode and pho.cPhoType = 'itm' and pho.nPhoDel = 0 left join KIMG.kimgProduct pro on itm.cItmProd = pro.cPrdCode WHERE nItmCnt = #{param}
SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgTaskStatus;
SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgTaskType;

SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgTask t LEFT JOIN KIMG.kimgTaskStatus ts on t.cTskStatus = ts.cTstType LEFT JOIN KIMG.kimgTaskType tt on t.cTskType = tt.cTtpType where nRefItm = #{param} and nTskDel = 0 ORDER BY t.nTskCnt desc;

SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgTask t LEFT JOIN KIMG.kimgTaskStatus ts on t.cTskStatus = ts.cTstType LEFT JOIN KIMG.kimgTaskType tt on t.cTskType = tt.cTtpType left Join KIMG.kimgItem it on t.nRefItm = it.nItmCnt left join KIMG.kimgEvent ev on it.cItmEvent = ev.cEvnCode left join KIMG.kimgCategory cat on it.cItmCate = cat.cCatType left join KIMG.kimgProduct pro on it.cItmProd = pro.cPrdCode where nTskDel = 0 and it.nItmDel = 0 ORDER BY t.nTskCnt desc;
select * from KIMG.kimgDash order by nDasCnt desc limit 1

select * from KIMG.kimgTask t LEFT JOIN KIMG.kimgTaskStatus s on t.cTskType = s.cTstType left Join KIMG.kimgItem it on t.nRefItm = it.nItmCnt where cTskType = 'INC' and nTskDel = 0 order by t.nTskCnt desc

select * from KIMG.kimgTask t LEFT JOIN KIMG.kimgTaskStatus s on t.cTskType = s.cTstType left Join KIMG.kimgItem it on t.nRefItm = it.nItmCnt where 1=1
and t.nTskCnt like CONCAT('%',#{nTskCnt},'%')
and it.cItmCode like CONCAT('%',#{cItmCode},'%')
and t.cTskStatus like CONCAT('%',#{cTskStatus},'%')
and it.cItmVenue like CONCAT('%',#{cItmVenue},'%')
and t.cTskCrtUsr like CONCAT('%',#{cTskCrtUsr},'%')
and t.cTskNote like CONCAT('%',#{cTskNote},'%')
and cTskType = 'INC' and nTskDel = 0 order by t.nTskCnt desc
